CustomField.description: Determines the sequence part data to be placed in the related sequence. Depending on the Class field, this can be the API name of a field or lookup relationship on the object defined in the related Sequence Field record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the sequence part data to be placed in the related sequence. Depending on the Class field, this can be the API name of a field or lookup relationship on the object defined in the related Sequence Field record.
CustomField.label: Value
